tweet.text: A: Clifton Wharton, the only #AfricanAmerican to join from 1924 until 1945. He served in Liberia, Canary Islands, and Madagascar. #BHM2014
tweet.html: A: Clifton Wharton, the only #AfricanAmerican to join from 1924 until 1945. He served in Liberia, Canary Islands, and Madagascar. #BHM2014
